orig_text:
In case of an inconsistency between time-offset and time zone suffix, 
if the critical flag is used on the time zone suffix, an application
MUST act on the inconsistency. If the critical flag is not used,
it MAY act on the inconsistency. Acting on the inconsistency 
may involve rejecting the timestamp or resolving the inconsistency
via additional information, such as user input and/or programmed
behavior.
correct_text:
In case of an inconsistency between time-offset and time zone suffix, 
if the critical-flag is used on the time zone suffix, an application
MUST act on the inconsistency. If the critical-flag is not used,
it MAY act on the inconsistency. Acting on the inconsistency 
may involve rejecting the timestamp or resolving the inconsistency
via additional information, such as user input and/or programmed
behavior.
